result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott A Manthei

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Judgment of Dismissal/Acquittal mailed to defendant at 207 W Cook Street $522, Portage was returned marked "return to sender, not deliverable as addressed"
and Notice of Right to Seek Post Conviction Relief filed by defendant/counsel

Defendant Scott A Manthei in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Amended Complaint filed in 14 CF 451, 14 CF 452 and 14 CF 481, waives reading, Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 4 in 14 CF 451, Ct. 3 in 14 CF 452, Ct. 4 in 14 CF 481, Judgment to be entered, 14 CF 302, 14 CF 451, Ct. 1, Ct. 2, Ct. 3, 14 CF 452, Ct. 1, Ct. 2, 14 CF 481, Ct. 1, Ct. 2, Ct. 3 dismissed, read in, 14 CF 451, Ct. 4, 14 CF 452, Ct. 3,  and 14 CF 481, Ct. 4, Court withholds sentence, probation 12 months, 14 CF 451, Ct. 4, maintain absolute sobriety, AODA and comply, $443.00 costs, 6 month probation review, 1 day jail credit, 14 CF 452, Ct. 3, maintain absolute sobriety, AODA and comply, $443.00 costs, 6 month probation review hearing, 1 day sentence credit,  14 CF 481, Ct. 4, maintain absolute sobriety, AODA and comply, $443.00 costs, 6 month probation review hearing, 2 days sentence credit, bond to be applied, defendant to report to Probation and Parole Office by Noon today,
Defendant Scott A Manthei in court with attorney .  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Klopp requesting prelim,  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 26, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Cases heard: 14CF451, 14CF302 & 14CF452, Attorney Roger L. Klopp appeared for the defendant. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court continued this to the Dec. 17th court date.

Defendant Scott A Manthei in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Christine M. Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called:  14CF302, 14CF451, & 14CF452.  Atty Klopp is new to cases, requested a new pretrial and return.  Bond remains.
with Petition For Leave to File Additional Motions filed by DA Kohlwey
records.descr: Notice of motion and motion for discovery

records.addlTxt: Maintain absolute sobriety.  Not go on premises where alcohol is sold for on site consumption.  No contact with D.K. or her residence or place of employment.  Standard felony conditions.

Defendant Scott A Manthei by video, in custody with attorney Leonie Dolch.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  $1000.00 signature bond.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Not go on premises where alcohol is sold for on site consumption.  No contact with D.K. or her residence or place of employment.  Standard felony conditions.  Waives time limits.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 10, 2014 at 10:20 am.  Hearing scheduled for October 23, 2014 at 02:45 pm.
